website_summaries.verdict: A strong multifunctional tool that truly will fit right into your wallet alongside your credit cards.
pros: Flat tool that can easily fit into your wallet
Thin, yet strong enough that it won't bend
cons: Certain parts of the card are sharp and may hurt your fingers

customer_reviews.title: Airport TSA Tossed it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a month ago. Maybe I didn't give it enough time, but I had two main issues with it. 1. I never really had a use for it. I spend the majority of my time at home, so I can use the full-size tool for any of its listed capabilities 2. The first trip I took with it, TSA confiscated it and threw it away as it looks basically like a knife (or as scary - the guy showed me the x-ray image), so I didn't really have it to use. It's also nearly metallic, so when the TSA guy picked it up, that basically sealed the deal. Great concept, but not sure the practicality is there.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but box cutter does not function well
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product saved for a long time and was so excited to receive it! I thought the box cutter part would be the most useful and was also quite excited to use the screwdriver. The box cutter was very disappointing, using it to cut open a box was the equivalent of using a normal blunt credit card. I think this is a great idea but maybe could use some re-configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Lee

customer_reviews.title: The perfect stocking stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a stocking stuffer type gift for my fiancé. He absolutely loves it! The fact it fits in his wallet is a bonus. I have to admit I’m a bit jealous. He’s opening bottles, tightening the screws on my glasses, and more within seconds. I may need to get my own. Also, mine only came in a plastic sleeve and not the giant made for TV box. I cross checked the other reviews, and mine seems legit. Just different packaging now.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Cholewinski

customer_reviews.title: Send directions!
customer_reviews.text: The design is great, it’s compact and useful for everyday things however I wish it came with a package insert explaining each feature. Ended up watching a YouTube video to get that info
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Catherine JoDon

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Every tool seems to work pretty well for me. Don't expect the tools like screwdriver and hex heads to replace actual ones, but it's handy when the actual ones aren't on hand, which is probably why you're buying this. Cell phone stand doesn't work. It just bends the card if you can manage to not have your phone slide off. Would need a card that is very stiff , or maybe something thin and metal, or a rubberized case on your phone to help it stay.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Limited utility but hand to have
customer_reviews.text: So this seems TSA compliant because there are no bladed edges, and no sharp extended protruding points. The wrenches are possibly useless unless you are in the most convenient of situations to get the width of the card in a space where you have room to rotate a nut or bolt, and just happen to not need very much torque or leverage to loosen it. However, the product is light weight and I do not notice it in my wallet. Further it has already proved useful opening packages and bottles. I can see the product being handy for several situations over the many years I expect it to last.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY. THIS IS A FRAUD. The materials are substandard. I had an original. This isn't close. Most of the features DO NOT WORK because the metal used is not capable of being formed to precision, and its too soft.
customer_reviews.author: Merciless

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and so I didn't have the time to return it and buy a new one when it arrived. I opened it and it was obvious that it wasn't authentic. The cutter part was NOT sharp whatsoever and was actually curved. I don't expect it to actually be able to cut anything. Additionally, one of the small white labels was printed incorrectly. It seemed like it had rubbed off or was just because of a poor printing job. Half of the word was visible. I only kept this because it was a birthday gift, and the intended recipient's birthday was approaching too quickly to have time to return it and get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Useful EDC Card
customer_reviews.text: I received this EDC card as a gift three years ago and I cant believe how many times if has come in handy! It is very well constructed - it has absolutely NO bend to it - and can easily open beers/bottles turn small hex bolts, screw small screws, etc. It fits perfectly in my wallet and has never set off alarms at the airport. This is a must have for any EDC enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: K.P. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: I needed #11
customer_reviews.text: Neither size ten nor twelve fit and it is why I bought it for. Looks like the opener is for left handed people, could not open a shipment box with it. The phone stand does work superb for my small phone, when I ll need it. The ruler is well marked but marks look very inexact. Screwdrivers do work neat, but what I like is the protruding arm to poke in tight spaces. A full ABC stencil would be better than the branding name, for thin markers. *opening a metallic fastener, the screwdriver arm broke. Now the box opener works; seems made for left handed people.
customer_reviews.author: syntotic

customer_reviews.title: Slim swiss knife in your wallet
customer_reviews.text: I really love this multi use card. very useful, I recently needed a screwdriver to fix my kids toys in the field, was able to find one but took a lot of time to find someone who has. Somebody mentioned to have this product in their pocket and glad we purchased coz I know I will surely be needing it and I don't have to bring a bunch of tools. Its like a slim swiss knife. but the size of the credit card. and better. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tech Toys and More

customer_reviews.title: The recipient loves it and is happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift. The recipient likes the item, but had trouble carrying it through airport security. The item is listed as TSA approved, but TSA agents have not been keen on the item passing through security. After he was questioned twice (ultimately allowed to pass through security with this tool) he has stopped carrying the item since he travels frequently and could easily forget to remove it from his wallet if he were to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Not useful
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the idea. But one of the other comments say TSA takes it away from you anyway. Putting your smart phone on it is frustrating and doesn't work. All other things just aren't that useful, because I have better tools on my leatherman wingman.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Small and functional
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helpful to have on hand! The ninja is small and slim, but punches above its weight-class in terms of usefulness. The tools are all things you might find yourself searching through a drawer for and are useful in a pinch. You obviously aren't going to be able to construct a deck with anything on this credit card-sized device, but it fits comfortably in your wallet and will help you open a beer or tighten a screw. The coolest feature that I couldn't find on most other similar products was the credit card phone stand. It is great for planes and other travel applications (I haven't had trouble bringing this on a plane anywhere I have traveled, FYI).
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cheeselton

customer_reviews.title: Not so much a Ninja
customer_reviews.text: Not so much a Wallet Ninja, maybe a white belt karate trainee. I wish I had followed the advice of other buyers. Letter opener is not sharp. Cellphone stand is useless. I kept it because it's okay for a handy tool to have in case you need to tighten a screw or open the occassional bottle cap. Haven't tried the peeler and probably will have no need of it. Maybe it will be useful for a small straightedge.
customer_reviews.author: Mike7763

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products that sound amazing, but then you never really use. I've tried using the screwdrivers multiple times, but since they're on a card, they usually don't fit where you need to use them. I'm too afraid to use the fruit peeler because this thing is in my pocket and it is already gross plus it would make my wallet sticky. Bottle opener is a great feature! Smartphone stand is also great! Other than those two things, is pretty useless for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Braziel

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for someone. We grew up around tools and at times, when you least expect it, you need a small tool for something simple around the house, work, etc. You need a screwdriver to put together an Ikea Coffee table, IT HAS IT! You are at a party and everyone forgot their bottle opener, IT HAS IT! WIth 18 tools you can take this anywhere and it can be beneficail. And it is super convientent to have in your wallet.
customer_reviews.author: e_e

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this ninja wallet card!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest present my husband will ever get!! He's so excited. It comes in this really cute triangle packaging, which made him have no idea what it is. But He's so excited because it fits in his wallet and so far he's gotten a ton of use out of it. It's exactly what it says, it holds the phone up with a credit card or gift card inserted. It's a great bottle opener, and I love that it can fix my glasses with the little mini screwdriver! This is one of the coolest multi purpose tools I have seen and I am so stoked to have gotten it for him. I have to find one for me now!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Romero

customer_reviews.title: All In One
customer_reviews.text: It does so many different things, amazing! Unfortunately it does nothing very well. The box opener and letter opener are far too dull to cut anything. The cell phone stand does not work whatsoever. The eyeglass screw driver is not thin enough to be able to be usable on eyeglasses. Even the fruit peeler does not function. How is the fruit peeler supposed to be able to peel fruit? Is there anything good about this product? It is insanely convenient and the regular screw drivers on this as well as the can opener work great. Would not recommend this product, simply buy a screwdriver, a knife and a bottle opener. They will actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Lazur

customer_reviews.title: Very handy gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my fiance for his birthday and it's actually really cool. It's super handy, too, we have already found ourselves needing to use it multiple times and it only got here a few days ago. Fits great in his wallet also. Great gift for anyone in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Paris

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and compact
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my husband earlier this year and he automatically said we needed to get more as Christmas presents this year. Definitely a convenient little add on
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: bulky, dont use it, tears up my wallet, etc...
customer_reviews.text: I dint like this because literally nothing works. And its annoying in my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: You’ll still need a different letter opener.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I was looking forward to having a handy letter opener, as part of this multi-tool. Very disappointed, as the letter opener mangles/tears the envelopes, rather than slicing them neatly open. I’ve gone back to using my pocket knife to open envelopes. The multi-tool feels sturdy but I haven’t tried any of the other tools yet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Handy Pocket Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to keep in your wallet. I had received this as a gift at least 5 years ago and used it often. Unfortunately had to give it up when going through a metal detector so I had to buy another. Keep it with you at all times(minus when going to airports haha)
customer_reviews.author: Wile E Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present from my Fiance. Fits right into my leather wallet with no problems at all. It doesn't pierce through my wallet granted my wallet is leather. bunch of tools that i could use when on the road or camping. Popped it out a few times to open my beers. Overall a great gift. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Pono

customer_reviews.title: Wallet shredding ninja
customer_reviews.text: Lots of sharp corners and edges to shred your wallet. They should include a slip cover for this thing. Otherwise it's well made, heavy and strong. It doesn't replace a proper toolkit or even a multi-tool, but if you get stuck needing a tool somewhere with just your wallet this could save the day.
customer_reviews.author: workingmusician

customer_reviews.title: Not for airplane carry-on!
customer_reviews.text: Versatile little multi-tool, very durable. Got this as gifts for the men in my life and they loved it. One thing to keep in mind is this isn't allowed through the airport as carry-on, apparently the letter opener piece is too knife-like. So make sure to put this in your cargo luggage or leave at home when going on a trip!
customer_reviews.author: Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, and to carry in your wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Great little card to carry in your wallet. Its nice to pullout and randomly open beer bottles and have people asking what that is. I've used many of the tools included at work or in certain situations. 10/10, perfect gift for that person who likes little useful gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Cell phone stand is gimmicky and does not work, screwdrivers are nearly useless
customer_reviews.text: The cell phone stand tool doesn’t work at all with my iPhone 8 Plus. The screwdrivers are also basically useless and have no traction on anything I've tried that's even moderated screwed in (I tested unscrewing the back lids of a few of my nearby guitar pedals). Very disappointed. Don't be too swayed by the 5-star reviews. In my opinion this product has not delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT fit nicely or slim in my wallet
customer_reviews.text: TOO heavy and thick. DOES NOT fit nicely or slim in my wallet! Disappointed! Took it out of wallet and tossed it in tool box with all the other "multi-purpose" crap I've been suckered into buying.
customer_reviews.author: psych-rn

customer_reviews.title: Cool Stocking Stuffer for Guys
customer_reviews.text: My son still has this in his wallet. Great for stocking stuffers for guys!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan H.

customer_reviews.title: Novelty, looks cool but waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Junk, broke after trying to use it as a screwdriver, very little pressure and snap!!!
customer_reviews.author: Soaked in Bleach

customer_reviews.title: Macgyver Approved!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one handy little thing! It fits neatly into a wallet and has a hundred and one uses. I got my older boys (ages 26 yrs & 16yrs) each one as a stocking stuffer and they both love them. I think Mama might need one too! Easy to do since these are very economical. Get everyone one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Slim, sturdy, and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend as a gift. He keeps it in his wallet and uses it whenever he gets the chance! Very slim, sturdy, and versatile. Would definitely recommend having one yourself or giving as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a stocking stuffer for my partner, and he immediately used it to open another gifts’ boxes and cut the tapes. It’s a funny little gift, and he now carries it around in this wallet. Does exactly what is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stiffer
customer_reviews.text: Gave as stocking stuffers for my boys. They still carry them in their wallet
customer_reviews.author: divemom

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: The Wallet Ninja is much more heavy-duty than I anticipated. It's solid, and I don't have any fear of the various features snapping off. My stepdad was surprised to find this had a fruit peeler on it! Also, just a side note, I loved that the words "Wallet Ninja" aren't stamped on the product but are actually cut out. Just a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Misapinoa

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It was OK there are a lot of dupes out there in stores but Def not as sturdy and made as well. It's a good tool to just have but sometimes it's a Lil too thick for what it's needed for.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Sulano

customer_reviews.title: With that being said sometimes the other tools like the staby thing or the hex keys come in ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay i'll be honest I almost exclusively use this thing for the bottle opener. With that being said sometimes the other tools like the staby thing or the hex keys come in handy. It's just much more seldom than the bottle opener. My only complaint is that the rough edges might cut a hole in some of your wallet fabric like it has mine. It has passed through TSA numerous times just fine too.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Thimian

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, versatile and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes, very comfortable. I walk 10K steps each day at work and they were comfortable all day right out of the box. Very neutral, can he dressed up or down. Didn't make my feet all sweaty. True to size
customer_reviews.author: AREC

customer_reviews.title: Useful product and very durable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these as Christmas gifts and stocking stuffers over the holidays. The guys loved them and used them that same day! They easily slide in and out of their wallets and I love all the different tools they have available. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Hmelton925

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars because it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Many envelopes were opened, bottlecaps popped and bolts turned. Strong and sturdy construction with a good weight. It is the size of a credit card and fits perfectly in my wallet. Side note: Be aware of counterfeits since I was shipped one from a seller. See photo. Top is real; came in completely plastic wrapped/crimped package. Bottom is counterfeit; edges that were supposed to be sharpened/angled were flat (such as the letter opener and screwdriver). It came in a faded printed cardboard package with glued on plastic cover.
customer_reviews.author: Man Trinh

customer_reviews.title: Carry around a bottle opener everywhere you go!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend 9 months ago and he carries it in his wallet and uses it almost daily! There are many times when someone asked “does anyone have a bottle opener?” And he can pull this out! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Genna

customer_reviews.title: Worth it/A handy gift for anyone
customer_reviews.text: It's super cool, not expensive, and useful. It's nice to have on hand. I gifted to my bf and it's very convenient to have on hand as he always keeps his wallet with him.
customer_reviews.author: Sel

customer_reviews.title: Kinda neat, but kind of a pain to carry.
customer_reviews.text: Really was looking forward to using this, but it makes my wallet quite a bit heavier and also slides out of the craig card slot in my wallet a lot. I don't use it much, so it seemed more of a pain to carry around in my wallet, so now I no longer carry it around.
customer_reviews.author: juspain

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son for Christmas. He used it right away to help open packages. He has used most of the features already. Great idea for any guy on your list.
customer_reviews.author: CatCatDog

customer_reviews.title: Have already used it for boxes and the screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never carried a full leather man and now I don’t have to, this is perfect for opening boxes to having a screwdriver handy. I have a utility knife and other tools around but having this in my picket is lerfect
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: It's a gimick
customer_reviews.text: The wallet ninja is pretty much useless. The box cutter is clumsy to use, the phone stand is laughable, the bottle opener is awkward, everything else is barely usable. Save your money and don't bother with this gimmicky thing.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Mota

customer_reviews.title: Comes in handy
customer_reviews.text: Made a great stocking stuffer and came in handy opening up the rest of the gifts! Haven't used all the features yet, but good to have around!
customer_reviews.author: C. Sorrells

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy so I’m pleased. I was afraid this would be easy to break but it’s metal! Fits in a standard wallet and great to know you always have it.
customer_reviews.author: Kijana

customer_reviews.title: Durable but not bulky.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a little beast. It’s durable enough to open a can but sl beer enough to fit easily in my wallet. The letter opener is sharp enough that you need to watch your fingers. Love it. Bought one for my husband and he loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Become a ninja in seconds just by reaching in your wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Many great features you'll forget you have because you keep it in your wallet and forget you have it. Can also be used as throwing star if you throw it hard enough!!
customer_reviews.author: Daveheart

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great back up tool looks well made and strong, everything works except what I needed for the most the letter opener, it's completely useless not sharp at all and will messed up your mail, it kinda works when opening boxed but you do have to struggle and there's no way to sharpen it. Overall still a good back up tool but not to replace the tools describe.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A. Perales

customer_reviews.title: Not TSA approved
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is touted as TSA approved but unfortunately TSA did not allow. As we purchased it to have available even while traveling it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: AFB

customer_reviews.title: Versatility!
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen or heard of anything like this before. Its so compact to fit in my wallet. Opening boxes and the screwdriver functions have never been so handy...what a treasured! Kudos to the designer!
customer_reviews.author: Scott D.

customer_reviews.title: Great mini multi tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little thing to have in my purse, I use it a lot, and it is so slim and small that you can take it anywhere. You can use it to open boxes, measure anything on the spot, great bottle opener saver, and many other things
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two, one for each son. I placed it in their Christmas Stockings and both played with them for 20 minutes trying out all the features.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Jasper

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift exchange gift and everyone was super impressed with it! It was getting passed around to open up gifts, scratch off lottery tickets, open the back of toys to put batteries in, and more! This is a perfect gift for anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Kupka

customer_reviews.title: Father's Day? Check!
customer_reviews.text: After searching Amazon for hours to find something to give my dad for Father's Day, I stumbled upon this gem. Surely he wouldn't have one of these! I actually know nothing about the product except that it successfully filled the critical role of being a Father's Day present. And I mean, that's a gift to me too. Unfortunately, he has a birthday coming up soon. I'm open to suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: J & D

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: A nice little took that fits in your wallet and is so versatile and handy to use anytime. Great product, fast service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazef
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this tool. Would be great stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet tool!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic item! I've had two of these now and both have been great. I love to keep one in my wallet and have actually used it on multiple occasions. It did get confiscated at an international airport security, so be careful if you plan to fly with it.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah R

customer_reviews.title: Cool item!
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my dad's Xmas stocking and he opened it and started playing with it immediately lol! Cool, not super bulky. I did take away one star because I tried to unscrew someywith it that day and it was not effective on a small screw requiring a Phillips head?! He used for some other things and it did work. Fun little gift for a handy person!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father. He was excited about a few of the features. He also liked that it fit into his wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Caetimom

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for some gimmicks tool
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is not that great and sophisticated but proves useful in some circumstances. The most uses I have made out of this product is the bottle opener. Not so much for the other 17 tools but the if your main desire is to show off some cool tool to your friends then I guess it pretty much covers the 17 un-usefulness of the product. It may also be worth noting that it may be a little bit heavy for some people. I personally don't mind though.
customer_reviews.author: wins_lord

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad for Father's day. It actually is pretty good quality. Some of the reviews said they got fake ones? This one seemed fine to me! I think it is such a good idea. I kind of want one now! Haha! Maybe I will get one for my husband for his birthday, and then I will have access to it.
customer_reviews.author: GMM

customer_reviews.title: Pocket tool that seems to be allowed past security
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in order to have some sort wallet tool when security won't allow my Swiss Army pocket knife into the building. So far, no one has confiscated my Wallet Ninja. I haven't tried to get it past TSA, though it reportedly doesn't have any prohibited features. Only complaint is that my cell phone is too large for the cell phone stand to work with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D. R. Arday

customer_reviews.title: Just a great tool and a great conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: Just a great tool and a great conversation piece. Delivered on time, great seller. Bought a few, love it. One time the doorknob in my brother's place broke...it was jammed.....and he was on the second floor and I couldn't find any tools....and yes....I actually used this to dismantle the doorknob and got out. True story.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Such a great gift. Gave this as a gift to the guy who has everything, and he loved it. We always have a really hard time shopping for Christmas for him and we’re happy to find this product on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend bcuz he’s a construction worker and just thought it might come in handy any time. He loves it and thought it was cool.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Does not open boxes
customer_reviews.text: Does not open boxes. Get an actual knife. Letter opener is not sharpened either. Im not even sure if the can opener works.. looks just as flat and dull as the box opener. I tried to sharpen the tool with a file, but the steel is so hard it does not want to sharpen. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good Stocking Stuffer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my BF as a stocking stuffer for Christmas. I didn't open it yet but it comes in a cool triangle case that sort of reminds me of a throwing star. He's a retired Marine and always likes to be prepared so I think he'll really like this.
customer_reviews.author: Smile SaurusTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Cool tool
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is a small tool about the size of a credit card, that fits nicely into a wallet. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great guys gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my brother, he absolutely loves it!! He thought it was sooooo cool that this one has 18 functions vs the 12 function one (with a pocket knife) that he got confiscated at airport security. This one doesn't have a knife so hopefully it wont be!
customer_reviews.author: Blair Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice handy tool, it fits in my folding wallet, has nice little tools, different sized screwdriver heads, various sized hex tools. I do wish the opener part was sharper as trying to open things like boxes, or thick paper or cut tape is a struggle. But overall a decent multi purpose tool.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Did not rcv original order. Got 2nd order
customer_reviews.text: I only got 2nd order. Charged for both orders. I ordered two originally. Did not get. Ordered a second 2 and I rcvd those today. So 2 are out th er e somewhere thx
customer_reviews.author: Becky Steman

customer_reviews.title: Cool little gadget
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my husbands stocking for Christmas and he loves it! He uses it everyday now and shows everyone how awesome it is. One of the ear pieces cake of my glasses and he was able to fix them with this wallet ninja!
customer_reviews.author: Erin defilippi

customer_reviews.title: Great small gift
customer_reviews.text: I used these as part of a my Groomsmen gifts. I still get comments from my several of the guys I gave them to about how useful they are, how durable and how often the use them. I just forgot to get myself one!
customer_reviews.author: Madvlader

customer_reviews.title: Fun but useful product
customer_reviews.text: While this is an interesting piece of merchandise, it is also functional. It's a great piece to have on you at all times. You never know when it might come in handy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Raymer

customer_reviews.title: They probably need to use a stronger alloy for this to actually be useful.
customer_reviews.text: Used screwdriver once to tighten a small screw, alloy wasn't strong enough and it's slightly bent now. They probably need to use a stronger alloy for this to actually be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Matija H.

customer_reviews.title: Decent multi tool
customer_reviews.text: The eyeglasses screwdriver was too thick for my glasses, but a few seconds with a sharpening stone fixed that. The cell phone holder is a joke though, none of my credit cards were thick enough and stiff enough to hold up my cell phone. If you still had an iphone 3 or a older 4in diag screen, it might work, but the slot works better to get wing nuts more torque, but you can also use the two Ns in the name for that as well. If you cannot carry a multi-tool or knife at work because of reasons, this is an acceptable alternative.
customer_reviews.author: A. Krane

customer_reviews.title: Not laid out the best
customer_reviews.text: I mostly used it for the edges which are flathead screwdriver size and the bottle opener. 1. Edges are not precise enough for eyeglass screws. 2. Bottle opener is totally the wrong direction - if the opening was rotated 90 deg there would be more leverage. As it is, you have to grip it on the hex head edge which is uncomfortable. I've tried to use it in a couple of bars when I order a beer and everyone chuckles when it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and versitility of this little tool, everyone I gave this to loved it. I'm keeping one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the wallet ninja, was happy to receive it for Christmas. So far the bottle opener tool works great.
customer_reviews.author: Trinnie

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful tool, I had bought a few as stocking stuffers and everyone liked them so much! I realized I needed one for myself too!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome groomsman gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as our groomsmen gifts and I feel these will be a total hit! Another reviewer had posted about issues with an inauthentic product but mine seem to be completely legit.
customer_reviews.author: Sharayah

customer_reviews.title: No complaints thus far...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift to my brother in-law. I’m not sure how well it works, but it arrived as described and seems like a cool idea!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift that is useful
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as stocking stuffers for the men in the family. Huge hit
customer_reviews.author: Sara Goetsch

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift, but I don't think they ever used it even once.
customer_reviews.author: Maleah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect little thing to buy. It literally helped me so many times. And I just pull it out of nowhere and my friends are like "hey thats pretty cool!" It is well worth it :D and it is really really strong for how thin it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great and useful gifts
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as stocking stuffers and they are super high quality, heavy duty, and useful! They are heavier than expected but I've been carrying it around in my wallet and find it useful.
customer_reviews.author: K. Royce

customer_reviews.title: What a great stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these in my wallet for years. I bought one for my wife to keep in hers. She loves it! We opened our stockings before our gifts, and this came in handy to cut the tape on all the boxes from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin Electronics

customer_reviews.title: bro gadget everyone needs
customer_reviews.text: I love this gadget because it serves to purposes for me. It keeps my wallet straight while in my butt pocket and gets err done in popping open beer bottles when I need it. I also use to open my mail.
customer_reviews.author: Cardon Slater

customer_reviews.title: Happy Boyfriend.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend and he loves it. He didn't seem all to excited when I first gave it to him (It was Christmas though, and he also got a PS4.. so I didn't expect a huge reaction out of this stocking stuffer), but now he is always telling me how much use he gets out of it at work. Cool design, and very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Caiteraid

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very useful
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very useful. Just a note of warning... while it is TSA approved, TSA will make you take it out of your wallet for inspection. Also, other locations may not allow it despite the fact it is TSA approved. I had mine confiscated at a courthouse when I went for jury duty. The deputy said that "We aren't the TSA." when I said it was approved for in flight and couldn't understand why he needed to confiscate it at a courthouse. Recommend the manufacturer include that disclaimer on the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: N. ONeil

customer_reviews.title: Great easy gift
customer_reviews.text: Easy gift for every man in the family. And they all loved it
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rohaidy

customer_reviews.title: But the few things I have use it for like as a screwdriver and bottle and letter opener work ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it as much as I thought I would when I bought it. And I haven't use all of its functions. But the few things I have use it for like as a screwdriver and bottle and letter opener work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Corey M. Sandifer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a co-worker as a gag gift. He liked it and put it into his wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea! Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Very Neat Idea! Bought as a gift for my stepfather and he loved it. Will be buying more, as other members of my family want one too. Came in handy for opening battery covers on toys Christmas Morning!
customer_reviews.author: Heather D

customer_reviews.title: Kind of meh
customer_reviews.text: It is what it says it is but I haven't found it as useful as I thought I might.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Schnereger
